




"Point in Time" Regulation Content

Assessment Act


Prescribed Classes of Property Regulation

B.C. Reg. 438/81






NOTE:

Links below go to regulation content as it was prior to the
changes made on the effective date. (PIT covers changes made
from September 19, 2009 to "current to" date of the
regulation.)




SECTION
EFFECTIVE DATE


Section 1

November 27, 2009





September 1, 2012





June 15, 2018





March 11, 2021



Section 4

October 25, 2013



Section 5

March 11, 2021



Section 8

November 27, 2009





March 11, 2021



Section 15

June 25, 2012



Schedule B

October 30, 2009





October 29, 2010





October 27, 2011





October 25, 2012





October 25, 2013

October 28, 2016





October 23, 2017





October 22, 2018





October 28, 2019





September 20, 2020





October 29, 2021





October 24, 2022









Section 1 (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 275/2009, effective November
27, 2009.


(c) land having no present use and which is neither
specifically zoned nor held for business, commercial or industrial
purposes;



Section 1 (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 323/2010, effective November
19, 2010.


(c) land having no present use and which is neither
specifically zoned nor held for business, commercial or industrial
purposes, but not including land included in Class 9;



Section 1 (2) was added by BC Reg 323/2010, effective November 19,
2010.





Section 1 (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 138/2012, effective September
1, 2012.


(b) improvements on land classified as a farm and used in
connection with the farm operation, including the farm residence and
outbuildings;





Section 1 (1) (c) (ii) (A) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 117/2018,
effective June 15, 2018.




(A)

a zoning bylaw under section 903 or 904 of the
Local Government Act
or under section 565 or 565.1 of the
Vancouver Charter
, a phased development agreement under section 905.1 of the
Local Government Act
, an official development plan under section 562 of the
Vancouver Charter
, a covenant under section 219 of the
Land Title Act
, or a land use contract under the
Local Government Act
applies to the land, and





Section 1 (1) (a) (i) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 64/2021, effective
March 11, 2021.




(i)

hotels or motels other than the portion of the hotel or motel
building occupied by the owner or manager as his or her residence,





Section 4 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 212/2013, effective October 25,
2013.




Class 4 — major industry



4

Class 4 property shall include only the property referred to in
section 20 (3) of the Act, that is to say,


(a) land used in conjunction with the operation of industrial
improvements, and

(b) industrial improvements.
[en. B.C. Reg. 99/88.]





Section 5 (f) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 64/2021, effective March 11,
2021.




(f)

used principally as an outlet for the sale of a finished product to
a purchaser for purposes of his or her own consumption or use and
not for resale in either the form in which it was purchased or any
other form, and





Section 8 (1) (c) was added by BC Reg 274/2009, effective November
27, 2009.



Section 8 (2) was added by BC Reg 274/2009, effective November 27,
2009.





Section 8 (1) (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 64/2021, effective March
11, 2021.




(b)

that part of any land and improvements used or set aside for use as
a place of public worship or as a meeting hall for a nonprofit
fraternal organization of persons of either or both sexes, together
with the facilities necessarily incidental to that use, for at least
150 days in the year ending on June 30, of the calendar year
preceding the calendar year for which the assessment roll is being
prepared, not counting any day in which the land and improvements so
used or set aside are also used for





Section 15 was enacted by BC Reg 137/2012, effective June 25, 2012.





Schedule B BEFORE amended by BC Reg 257/2009, effective October 30,
2009.



Schedule B


[section 3.1]


[en. B.C. Reg. 208/2008, Sch. 2, s. 2; am. B.C. Reg. 302/2008.]




Designated eligible supportive housing property



1

For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the
Assessment Act
, the eligible supportive housing property identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in column 1 of the following table
are designated:





Item

Column 1

Assessment Roll Number

Schedule B BEFORE amended by BC Reg 313/2010, effective October 29,
2010.



Schedule B

[en. B.C. Reg. 257/2009.]

[section 3.1]




Interpretation



1

An assessment roll number set out in Column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on an assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the taxation year set out opposite in
Column 2 of that table.





Designated eligible supportive housing property



2

For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the
Assessment Act
, the eligible supportive housing property identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in column 1 of the following table
are designated:

Assessment Roll Number


Column 2

Taxation Year

Schedule B BEFORE amended by BC Reg 183/2011, effective October 27,
2011.



Schedule B

[en. B.C. Reg. 313/2010.]

[section 3.1]




Interpretation



1

An assessment roll number set out in Column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2011 taxation year.





Designated eligible supportive housing property



2

For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the
Assessment Act
, the eligible supportive housing properties identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in column 1 of the following table
are designated for the 2011 taxation year:





Item

Column 1

Assessment Roll Number



1
01-234-01006020


2
01-234-01020002


3
01-234-07492107


4
01-234-10746022


5

Schedule B BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 308/2012, effective October
25, 2012.



Schedule B

[en. B.C. Reg. 183/2011.]

[section 3.1]




Interpretation



1

An assessment roll number set out in Column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2012 taxation year.





Designated eligible supportive housing property



2

For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the
Assessment Act
, the eligible supportive housing properties identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in column 1 of the following table
are designated for the 2012 taxation year:





Item

Column 1

Assessment Roll Number



1
01-234-01006020


2
01-234-01020002

Schedule B BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 212/2013, effective October
25, 2013.



Schedule B

[en. B.C. Reg. 308/2012.]

(section 3.1)




Interpretation



1

An assessment roll number set out in Column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2013 taxation year.





Designated eligible supportive housing property



2

For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the
Assessment Act
, the eligible supportive housing properties identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in Column 1 of the following table
are designated for the 2013 taxation year:



Table





Item



Column 1

Assessment Roll Number




1

Schedule B BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 196/2015, effective October
29, 2015.



Schedule B


[en. B.C. Reg. 192/2014.]


(section 3.1)





Interpretation




1


An assessment roll number set out in Column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2015 taxation year.






Designated eligible supportive housing properties




2


For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the
Assessment Act
, the eligible supportive housing properties identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in Column 1 of the following table
are designated for the 2015 taxation year:



Table





Item



Column 1

Assessment Roll Number






1
01-234-01006020


2
01-234-01010011


3
01-234-01020002


4
01-234-01020018


5

Schedule B BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 256/2016, effective October
28, 2016.



Schedule B


[en. B.C. Reg. 196/2015, s. 1.]


(section 3.1)





Interpretation




1


An assessment roll number set out in Column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2016 taxation year.






Designated eligible supportive housing properties




2


For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the
Assessment Act
, the eligible supportive housing properties identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in Column 1 of the following table
are designated for the 2016 taxation year:



Table





Item



Column 1

Assessment Roll Number

2

Schedule B BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 191/2017, effective October
23, 2017.



Schedule B


[en. B.C. Reg. 256/2016, App.]


(section 3.1)





Interpretation




1


An assessment roll number set out in Column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2017 taxation year.






Designated eligible supportive housing properties




2


For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the Assessment Act, the
eligible supportive housing properties identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in Column 1 of the following table
are designated for the 2017 taxation year:

Schedule B BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 217/2018, effective October
22, 2018.



Schedule B


[en. B.C. Reg. 191/2017.]


(section 3.1)





Interpretation




1


An assessment roll number set out in Column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2018 taxation year.






Designated eligible supportive housing properties




2


For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the Assessment Act, the
eligible supportive housing properties identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in Column 1 of the following table
are designated for the 2018 taxation year:






Item



Column 1

Assessment Roll Number

Schedule B BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 212/2019, effective October
28, 2019.



Schedule B


[en. B.C. Reg. 217/2018.]


(section 3.1)





Interpretation




1


An assessment roll number set out in Column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2019 taxation year.






Designated eligible supportive housing properties




2


For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the
Assessment Act
, the eligible supportive housing properties identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in Column 1 of the following table
are designated for the 2019 taxation year:

























Schedule B BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 257/2020, effective September
20, 2020.



Schedule B


[en. B.C. Reg. 212/2019.]


(section 3.1)





Interpretation




1


An assessment roll number set out in Column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2020 taxation year.






Designated eligible supportive housing properties




2


For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the
Assessment Act
, the eligible supportive housing properties identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in Column 1 of the following table
are designated for the 2020 taxation year:










































Schedule B BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 269/2021, effective October
29, 2021.



Schedule B


[en. B.C. Reg. 257/2020.]


(section 3.1)





Interpretation

section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2021 taxation year.

Assessment Act

assessment roll numbers listed in column 1 of the following table

499
56-087-11135005








Schedule B BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 205/2022, effective October
24, 2022.



Schedule B


[en. B.C. Reg. 269/2021.]


(section 3.1)





Interpretation




1


An assessment roll number set out in column 1 of the table in
section 2 is the number on the assessment roll prepared by the
assessment authority for the 2022 taxation year.






Designated eligible supportive housing properties




2


For the purposes of section 19 (14.01) of the
Assessment Act
, the eligible supportive housing properties identified by the
assessment roll numbers listed in column 1 of the following table
are designated for the 2022 taxation year:




Item

Column 1

Assessment Roll Number





1
01-234-01006020


2
01-234-01008021


3
01-234-01010011


4
01-234-01020002


5
01-234-01020018
